About Flot Touch

The flot.touch.js plugin adds multi-touch support to Flot for supported browsers such as Mobile Safari. Gestures include swiping to pan and pinch-to-zoom. Panning and zooming can be constrained to a single axis if desired.

Using this plugin is as simple as including an additional <script/> tag after the Flot library is included:

<script type="text/javascript" src="jquery.flot.touch.js"></script>

The only pre-requisites are jQuery and Flot. This example was constructed using jQuery Mobile to provide mobile-friendly UI elements and screen constraints but it is not required.
